title: Factorialz
description: Cross your Ts, dot your Is, and factor your Zs

title: Exponentialz
description: Now we're talking power (NOTE: In Beta)

title: Collatz Conjecture
description: How many steps does it take to 1?  Find out with this handy calculator!

title: Car Chase
description: To play car chase, all you need to do is control the car with the WASD keys or arrow keys. Try not to die and reset stay alive as long as possible.  To restart, press the "r" key on your keyboard.
